globalSpecs.name: JASO FC - Meets smoke emission standard

marketing: Shell Advance^Â® Premium Snowmobile Oil is a high performance, low smoke, 2 stroke oil for premixed and injected 2 stroke gasoline engines.  Meeting the requirements of API TC, NMMA TC-W3, and JASO FC this oil may be used in all 2 stroke gasoline engines requiring these performance qualifications including air and water cooled engines and equipment beyond snowmobiles such as lawn equipment, scooters, and other recreational vehicles (ATVs and dirt bikes).
